text: aur (ai rasool) agar tum inase poochho ki saare aasamaan va zameen ko kisane paida kiya to ye log yaqeenan kahenge ki khuda ne, tum kah do ki to kya tumane gaur kiya hai ki khuda ko chhod kar jin logon kee tum ibaadat karate ho agar khuda mujhe koee taqaleeph pahunchaana chaahe to kya vah log usake nuqasaan ko (mujhase) rok sakate hain ya agar khuda mujh par meharabaanee karana chaahe to kya vah log usakee meharabaanee rok sakate hain (ai rasool) tum kaho ki khuda mere lie kaafee hai usee par bharosa karane vaale bharosa karate hain
